      • AbstractTrader

        public AbstractTrader(java.lang.String name,
                      ArtificialMarket artificialMarket,
                      Portfolio portfolio,
                      long max_buy,
                      long max_sell)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - - trader name
        artificialMarket - - reference to market
        portfolio - - portfolio object
        max_buy - - maximum number of shares that can be bought by one order
        max_sell - - maximum number of shares that can be sold by one order

    • Method Detail

      • runStrategy

        public Order runStrategy()
        run your trading strategy (Override this function) if you want to send order to market, you should not directly send your order, because it should be double checked by sendFinalOrderToMarket() if you do not want to send order to market, make sure your order volume is 0
        Returns:
        order that should be send to market

      • sendFinalOrderToMarket

        public void sendFinalOrderToMarket()
        Final check to make sure that trader sends correct order to market also this function, updates the performance results of trader (???) please do not change this function

      • buyShareFromTrader

        public void buyShareFromTrader(long money,
                               long shares)
        reduce shares from portfolio of trader and increase the money also indicator for successfull executed orders
        Parameters:
        money - - amount of money to add to portfolio
        shares - - amount of shares to substract from portfolio

      • sellShareToTrader

        public void sellShareToTrader(long money,
                              long shares)
        reduce money from portfolio of trader and increase the shares
        Parameters:
        money - - amount of money to substract from portfolio
        shares - - amount of shares to add to portfolio

      • getPortfolioValue

        public double getPortfolioValue()
        calculates actual value of portfolio by money and shares value

      • getTransactionCount

        public int getTransactionCount()
        A transaction is defined as buy and sell and is counted after the sell order (even if the sell order isn't executed)
        Returns:
        - number of transactions done by the trader
